member.name: T:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes
member.summary: The Windows Media Player Attribute Reference documents metadata attributes that are of interest to Windows Media Player SDK developers.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AcquisitionTime
member.summary: The AcquisitionTime attribute is the date and time the item was added to the library.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AcquisitionTimeDay
member.summary: The AcquisitionTimeDay attribute is the day part of the date and time the item was added to the library.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AcquisitionTimeMonth
member.summary: The AcquisitionTimeMonth attribute is the month part of the date and time the item was added to the library.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AcquisitionTimeYear
member.summary: The AcquisitionTimeYear attribute is the year part of the date and time the item was added to the library.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AcquisitionTimeYearMonth
member.summary: The AcquisitionTimeYearMonth attribute is the year and month part of the date and time the item was added to the library.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AcquisitionTimeYearMonthDay
member.summary: The AcquisitionTimeYearMonthDay attribute is the year, month, and day part of the date and time the item was added to the library.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AlbumId
member.summary: The AlbumID attribute is a unique identifier for the album.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AlbumIdAlbumArtist
member.summary: The AlbumIDAlbumArtist attribute is a unique identifier for the album.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AudioFormat
member.summary: The AudioFormat attribute is a FourCC code that identifies the audio format of the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Author
member.summary: The Author attribute is the name of a media artist or actor associated with the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AverageLevel
member.summary: The AverageLevel attribute is a 16-bit amplitude value indicating the average volume level.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Bitrate
member.summary: The Bitrate attribute is the bit rate of the item, in bits per second.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.BuyNow
member.summary: The BuyNow attribute is a PARAM value for use in commercial interactions.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.BuyTickets
member.summary: The BuyTickets attribute is a PARAM value for use in commercial interactions.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.CanonicalFileType
member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ContentDistributorDuration
member.summary: The ContentDistributorDuration attribute is the playing duration of the item, in seconds.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Copyright
member.summary: The Copyright attribute is the copyright message for the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.DefaultDate
member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.DisplayArtist
member.summary: The DisplayArtist attribute is the name of the artist that is displayed for an item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.DrmIndividualizedVersion
member.summary: The DRMIndividualizedVersion indicates the digital rights management (DRM) version that the digital media file requires.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.DrmKeyID
member.summary: The DRMKeyID attribute identifies the media usage rights for content that is protected using digital rights management (DRM).

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Duration
member.summary: The Duration attribute is the playing duration of the item, in seconds.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.FileSize
member.summary: The FileSize attribute is the size of the file in bytes.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.FileType
member.summary: The FileType attribute is the three-letter file name extension, such as "wma" or "mp3".

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.HmeAlbumTitle
member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.IsProtected
member.summary: The Is_Protected attribute indicates whether the content is protected using digital rights management (DRM).

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.IsTrusted
member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.LinkedFileUrl
member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.MediaType
member.summary: The MediaType attribute is the type of content in the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.MoreInfo
member.summary: The MoreInfo attribute is a PARAM value for use in commercial interactions.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.PeakValue
member.summary: The PeakValue attribute is a 16-bit amplitude value indicating the peak volume level.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ProviderLogoUrl
member.summary: The ProviderLogoURL attribute is the address of the logo of the provider of the attribute values.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ProviderUrl
member.summary: The ProviderURL attribute is the address of the home page of the provider of the attribute values.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.RecordingTime
member.summary: The RecordingTime attribute is the date and time of the original recording, for items where this date is different from the release date.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.RecordingTimeDay
member.summary: The RecordingTimeDay attribute is the day part of the date of the original recording, for items where this date is different from the release date.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.RecordingTimeMonth
member.summary: The RecordingTimeMonth attribute is the month part of the date of the original recording, for items where this date is different from the release date.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.RecordingTimeYear
member.summary: The RecordingTimeYear attribute is the year part of the date of the original recording, for items where this date is different from the release date.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.RecordingTimeYearMonth
member.summary: The RecordingTimeYearMonth attribute is the year and month part of the date of the original recording, for items where this date is different from the release date.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.RecordingTimeYearMonthDay
member.summary: The RecordingTimeYearMonthDay attribute is the date of the original recording (without the time of day), for items where this date is different from the release date.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ReleaseDate
member.summary: The ReleaseDate attribute is the date of the original release of the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ReleaseDateDay
member.summary: The ReleaseDateDay attribute is the day part of the date of the original release of the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ReleaseDateMonth
member.summary: The ReleaseDateMonth attribute is the month part of the date of the original release of the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ReleaseDateYear
member.summary: The ReleaseDateYear attribute is the year part of the date of the original release of the item.

member.summary: The ReleaseDateYearMonth attribute is the year and month part of the date of the original release of the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ReleaseDateYearMonthDay
member.summary: The ReleaseDateYearMonthDay attribute is the year, month, and day part of the date of the original release of the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.RequestState
member.summary: The RequestState attribute is the media information request state.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.SourceUrl
member.summary: The SourceURL attribute is the address of the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Streams
member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.SyncState
member.summary: The SyncState attribute is a string representation of a 32-bit value that Windows Media Player uses when it synchronizes playlists with portable devices.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.SyncState2
member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Title
member.summary: The Title attribute is the title of the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.TrackingId
member.summary: The TrackingID attribute is 128-bit Globally Unique Identifier (GUID) that Windows Media Player uses to identify a media item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Type
member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserCustom1
member.summary: The UserCustom1 attribute is arbitrary text.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserCustom2
member.summary: The UserCustom2 attribute is user defined text.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserEffectiveRating
member.summary: The UserEffectiveRating attribute is the rating computed by Windows Media Player based on how often the item has been played.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserLastPlayedTime
member.summary: The UserLastPlayedTime attribute is the date and time the item was most recently played.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserPlayCount
member.summary: The UserPlayCount attribute is the number of times the item has been played.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserPlaycountAfternoon
member.summary: The UserPlaycountAfternoon attribute is the number of times the item has been played between 12:00 and 17:00 local time.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserPlaycountEvening
member.summary: The UserPlaycountEvening attribute is the number of times the item has been played between 17:00 and 22:00 local time.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserPlaycountMorning
member.summary: The UserPlaycountMorning attribute is the number of times the item has been played between 06:00 and 12:00 local time.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserPlaycountNight
member.summary: The UserPlaycountNight attribute is the number of times the item has been played between 22:00 and 06:00 local time.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserPlaycountWeekday
member.summary: The UserPlaycountWeekday attribute is the number of times the item has been played on a Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, or Friday.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserPlaycountWeekend
member.summary: The UserPlaycountWeekend attribute is the number of times the item has been played on a Saturday or Sunday.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserRating
member.summary: The UserRating attribute is the rating specified by the user in the library.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UserServiceRating
member.summary: The UserServiceRating attribute is reserved for future use.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AlbumArtist
member.summary: The WM/AlbumArtist attribute is the name of the primary artist for the album.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.AlbumTitle
member.summary: The WM/AlbumTitle attribute is the title of the album on which the content was originally released.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Category
member.summary: The WM/Category attribute is the category of the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Composer
member.summary: The WM/Composer attribute is the name of the composer of the music.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Conductor
member.summary: The WM/Conductor attribute is the name of the conductor of the music.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ContentDistributor
member.summary: The WM/ContentDistributor attribute is the name of the distributor of the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ContentGroupDescription
member.summary: The WM/ContentGroupDescription attribute is the description of the content group, which is a collection of media items such as a CD boxed set.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.EncodingTime
member.summary: The WM/EncodingTime attribute is the date and time at which the content was encoded.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Genre
member.summary: The WM/Genre attribute is the genre of the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.InitialKey
member.summary: The WM/InitialKey attribute is the initial key of the music.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Language
member.summary: The WM/Language attribute is the language of the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Lyrics
member.summary: The WM/Lyrics attribute is the lyrics of the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Mcdi
member.summary: The WM/MCDI attribute is the music CD identifier of the CD from which the file or track was copied.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.MediaClassPrimaryId
member.summary: The WM/MediaClassPrimaryID attribute is a GUID specifying one of the primary media classes: music, non-music audio, video, or other.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.MediaClassSecondaryId
member.summary: The WM/MediaClassSecondaryID attribute is a GUID specifying the secondary media class, which is a subclass of the primary media class.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Mood
member.summary: The WM/Mood attribute is a category name for the mood of the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ParentalRating
member.summary: The WM/ParentalRating attribute is the parental rating of the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.PartOfSet
member.summary: The WM/PartOfSet attribute is the part number and the total number of parts of the set to which the item belongs.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Period
member.summary: The WM/Period attribute is the period of the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Picture
member.summary: The WM/Picture attribute contains a picture related to the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ProtectionType
member.summary: The WM/ProtectionType attribute is the type of protection used on the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Provider
member.summary: The WM/Provider attribute is the name of the provider of the attribute values.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ProviderRating
member.summary: The WM/ProviderRating attribute is the rating of the item assigned by the provider of the attribute values.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.ProviderStyle
member.summary: The WM/ProviderStyle attribute is the style of the item assigned by the provider of the attribute values.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Publisher
member.summary: The WM/Publisher attribute is the name of the company that published the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.SubscriptionContentId
member.summary: The WM/SubscriptionContentID attribute is the subscription content identifier.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.SubTitle
member.summary: The WM/SubTitle attribute is the subtitle of the content.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.Track
member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.TrackNumber
member.summary: The WM/TrackNumber attribute is the track number of the item on the album on which it was originally released.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.UniqueFileIdentifier
member.summary: The WM/UniqueFileIdentifier attribute is a string that uniquely identifies the item.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.AudioAttributes.WMCollectionGroupId
member.summary: The WM/WMCollectionGroupID attribute is a GUID identifying the group containing the collection to which the item belongs.

member.summary: The WM/WMCollectionID attribute is a GUID identifying the collection to which the item belongs.

member.summary: The WM/WMContentID attribute is a GUID identifying the content of the item.

member.summary: The WM/Writer attribute is the name of the writer who wrote the words of the content.

member.summary: The WM/Year attribute is the year the content was published.

member.summary: This attribute is undocumented.

member.name: T:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IOleClientSite
member.summary: Gives an embedded object information about resources provided by its container such as the location and extent of its display site, its moniker, and its user interface.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IOleClientSite.SaveObject
member.summary: Saves the embedded object associated with the client site.

summary.para: Retrieves a moniker for the object's client site.
An object can force the assignment of its own or its container's moniker by specifying a value for dwAssign.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IOleClientSite.GetContainer
member.summary: Retrieves a pointer to the object's container.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IOleClientSite.ShowObject
member.summary: Asks a container to display its object to the user.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IOleClientSite.OnShowWindow(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Notifies a container when an embedded object's window is about to become visible or invisible.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IOleClientSite.RequestNewObjectLayout
member.summary: Asks a container to resize the display site for embedded objects.

member.name: T:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IOleObject
member.summary: The IOleObject interface is the principal means by which an embedded object provides basic functionality to, and communicates with, its container.

member.summary: コンテナー中のクライアント サイトをコントロールに設定します。

member.name: T:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IWMPRemoteMediaServices
member.summary: The IWMPRemoteMediaServices interface includes methods that provide services to Windows Media Player from a program that hosts the Player control.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IWMPRemoteMediaServices.GetServiceType
member.summary: Called by Windows Media Player to determine whether a host program wants to run its embedded control remotely.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IWMPRemoteMediaServices.GetApplicationName
member.summary: Called by Windows Media Player to retrieve the name of the program that is hosting the remoted control.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IWMPRemoteMediaServices.GetScriptableObject(System.String@)
member.summary: Called by Windows Media Player to retrieve a name and interface pointer for an object that can be called from the script code within a skin.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Interop.IWMPRemoteMediaServices.GetCustomUIMode
member.summary: Called by Windows Media Player to retrieve the location of a skin file to apply to the Player control.

member.name: T:NowPlayingLib.Interop.MediaServiceProvider
member.summary: Windows Media Player の インターフェイスを実装します。

member.name: T:NowPlayingLib.Interop.OLECLOSE
member.summary: Indicates whether an object should be saved before closing.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.OLECLOSE.SAVEIFDIRTY
member.summary: The object should be saved if it is dirty.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Interop.OLECLOSE.NOSAVE
member.summary: The object should not be saved, even if it is dirty. This flag is typically used when an object is being deleted.

summary.para: If the object is dirty, the IOleObject::Close implementation should display a dialog box to let the end user determine whether to save the object.
However, if the object is in the running state but its user interface is invisible, the end user should not be prompted, and the close should be handled as if OLECLOSE_SAVEIFDIRTY had been specified.

member.name: T:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO
member.summary: Contains information about an entry in the Internet cache.

summary.para: Size of this structure, in bytes.
This value can be used to help determine the version of the cache system.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.SourceUrlName
member.summary: String that contains the URL name.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.LocalFileName
member.summary: String that contains the local file name.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.CacheEntryType
member.summary: A bitmask indicating the type of cache entry and its properties.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.UseCount
member.summary: Current number of WinINEet callers using the cache entry.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.HitRate
member.summary: Number of times the cache entry was retrieved.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.SizeLow
member.summary: Low-order portion of the file size, in bytes.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.SizeHigh
member.summary: High-order portion of the file size, in bytes.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.LastModifiedTime
member.summary: FILETIME structure that contains the last modified time of this URL.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.ExpireTime
member.summary: FILETIME structure that contains the expiration time of this file.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.LastAccessTime
member.summary: FILETIME structure that contains the last accessed time.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.LastSyncTime
member.summary: FILETIME structure that contains the last time the cache was synchronized.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.HeaderInfo
member.summary: Pointer to a buffer that contains the header information.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.HeaderInfoSize
member.summary: Size of the lpHeaderInfo buffer.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.FileExtension
member.summary: String that contains the file name extension used to retrieve the data as a file.

member.name: F:NowPlayingLib.Win32.INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO.ExemptDelta
member.summary: Exemption time from the last accessed time.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Win32.NativeMethods.GetUrlCacheEntryInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves information about a cache entry.
member.param: String that contains the name of the cache entry.
member.returns: INTERNET_CACHE_ENTRY_INFO structure that receives information about the cache entry.

member.name: M:NowPlayingLib.Win32.NativeMethods.DeleteUrlCacheEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the file associated with the source name from the cache, if the file exists.
member.param: String that contains the name of the source that corresponds to the cache entry.
